name: Gettin' Dicey
description:
Will chance be your friend, or foe? 

Roll the dice and travel around the board to navigate new rooms and short challenges. Wield the craps rattan, collect power-ups, and defeat enemies: the Poker Chips, the Playing Cards, and the Coins. 

With each lap around the board, enemies get stronger, but so will you. Push yourself to survive as long as possible as things start gettin' dicey. 

This rogue-like and board game hybrid, inspired by The Binding of Issac series, was created for the 2022 GMTK Game Jam. All of us hope you enjoy playing! 

  •  Evan Hecht - Developer
  •  Kaylee Bird - Artist 
  •  Reid Miller - Developer 
  •  Mark Truttmann - Developer
How to play
  • WASD - Move
  • Left click - Swing / Roll the Dice
  • Right click - Shoot

After each room, roll the dice to move your pawn. The pawn will land on a new space on the game board, indicating the type of room you will enter next. Clear as many rooms as you can to shoot for a high score!
